constraints.name: monotonic_sequence
constraints.description: 经验值需求序列是非递减的（即 b_i ≤ b_{i+1}）
constraints.formal: b_i ≤ b_{i+1} for all 1 ≤ i < m

constraints.name: consecutive_selection
constraints.description: 每个角色只能在连续的天数内被选择，一旦停止选择某个角色，则不能再选择该角色
constraints.formal: If character is played on days l to r, it cannot be played on any other day outside this range

constraints.name: penalty_factor
constraints.description: 总冒险等级之和需要减去一个惩罚因子 c 乘以不同角色的数量 d
constraints.formal: Objective: maximize (sum of adventure ranks) - c * d, where d is the number of distinct characters played
